item.title: links for 2008-04-04
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• PHP: IMAP - Manual
    These functions enable you to operate with the IMAP protocol, as well as the NNTP, POP3 and local mailbox access methods.
    (tags: code php email mail imap pop programming)
  • Awareness API - FeedBurner API - Google Code
    The FeedBurner Awareness API (AwAPI) allows publishers of FeedBurner feeds to reuse the detailed traffic statistics we capture for any of their feeds. Third-party applications and web services that consume feeds can leverage this data to provide useful fe
    (tags: api code FeedBurner rss documentation google programming)
